Package de.awi.floenavigation.network

This package handles the network connection with the ais transponder over wifi.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NetworkMonitor
    NetworkMonitor runs on a separate thread.
    NetworkService
    An IntentService subclass for handling asynchronous task requests in a service on a separate handler thread.

Package de.awi.floenavigation.network Description

This package handles the network connection with the ais transponder over wifi. NetworkService is an intent service which runs a thread NetworkMonitor.

The functionality of the thread is to continuously ping the server and checks whether the connection between the tablet and the ais transponder is still available. If the ping is successful, it executes AISMessageReceiver on a separate thread which is responsible for creating a telnet client connection with the server and for checking whether the packet is of AIVDM or AIVDO. Eventually sending the packet to the AISDecodingService for decoding of the packet. However, if the ping is unsuccessful NetworkMonitor sends a disconnect flag to the AISMessageReceiver requesting it to disconnect the telnet connection. The thread which runs the AISMessageReceiver on receival of the disconnect flag, stops decoding the packet. If the thread does not have any work to do, it eventually dies out. After every transition from a unsuccessful ping request to successful ping request, a new thread to execute AISMessageReceiver is created. This helps the app to have continuous connection to the AIS transponder.
